name: Garry the Gambling Gnome
description:
Garry the Gambling Gnome is a top-down puzzle game in which you move dice to complete various levels. To move a die, you can push them with Garry. To see which side will face upward when moving a die, hover the mouse cursor over the die. Complete the levels by pushing the dice on their tile with the correct side facing upwards. Get to rolling and help Garry escape the dungeon! 

This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. 

By: Kat9_123 (Programming) and dekaaspro (Art)

GitHub repo: github.com/Kat9-123/Garry-the-Gambling-Gnome
